SUCCESS.SALE_ADD: Successfully added new sale to database, thanks
SUCCESS.UPDATE_LOG_ADD: Successfully added new log to database. thanks
SUCCESS.UPDATE_LOG_EDIT: Successfully updated log in database, thanks
SUCCESS.PRODUCT_ADDED: Successfully added new product to database, thanks
SUCCESS.PRODUCT_EDITED: Successfully changed product data in database, thanks
SUCCESS.PRODUCT_REMOVED: Successfully removed product from database, thanks
SUCCESS.EMPLOYER_LOGIN: Successfully logged into the system, welcome
SUCCESS.EMPLOYER_ADD: Successfully hired a new employee, thank you

ERRORS.USERS_GETTING_ERROR: An error occurred while getting users from the database!!!
ERRORS.UPDATES_GETTING_ERROR: An error occurred while getting updates from the database!!!
ERRORS.UPDATES_POSTING_ERROR: An error occurred while adding new update log to the database!!!
ERRORS.UPDATES_EDITING_ERROR: An error occurred while trying to update data of updates log in database!!!
ERRORS.PRODUCTS_GETTING_ERROR: An error occurred while getting products from the database!!!
ERRORS.PRODUCT_ADD_ERROR: An error occurred while trying to add a product to the database!!!
ERRORS.PRODUCT_EDIT_ERROR: An error occurred while trying to edit a product in the database!!!
ERRORS.PRODUCT_DELETE_ERROR: An error occurred while trying to removed product from the database!!!
ERRORS.SALES_GETTING_ERROR: An error occurred while getting sales list from database!!!
ERRORS.SALES_ADD_ERROR: An error occurred while adding new sale to the database!!!
ERRORS.SALES_DELETE_ERROR: An error occurred while trying to delete sale from database!!!
ERRORS.ORDERS_GETTING_ERROR: An error occurred while retrieving user orders from the database!!!
ERRORS.EMPLOYER_LOGIN_ERROR: Incorrect login information or you are not employed!!!
ERRORS.EMPLOYER_ADD_ERROR: There was an error when hiring an employee!!!
ERRORS.EMPLOYER_GETTING_ERROR: There was an error when downloading employees from the database!!!
ERRORS.EMPLOYER_REMOVING_ERROR: An error occurred when firing an employee

INFO.STOPPED_SALE_REMOVING: Deletion of sales from the base has been cancelled
INFO.ORDERS_EXISTING: This user does not have any orders yet, you have to wait
INFO.SALES_EXISTING: Sorry, but there are no sales at this time
INFO.STOPPED_EMPLOYER_REMOVING: The process of dismissing an employee was canceled

MESSAGES.NO_USER: You forgot to select a user from the table
MESSAGES.CONNECTION_LOST: The connection was lost or other technical problems occurred
